thread.title: Hundreds gather in Flint to honor Selma marchers, push for clean water
thread.title_full: Hundreds gather in Flint to honor Selma marchers, push for clean water

author: Roberto Acosta | racosta1@mlive.com
title: Hundreds gather in Flint to honor Selma marchers, push for clean water
text: "We know that this is commemorating the Selma march, but it's also saying if we come together we should be able to have clean water, clean pipes, and shouldn't have to worry about paying for poison water," he told the crowd outside city hall.
